meanings.sent1: Her evincive smile revealed her happiness.
meanings.sent2: The evincive video left no doubt about the culprit.
meanings.sent3: The evincive dance moves of the penguin entertained the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The evincive colors of the sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The evincive aroma of freshly baked cookies filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Serving as evidence or proof of something.
meanings.sent1: The evincive document confirmed his alibi.
meanings.sent2: His evincive alibi cleared him of any suspicion.
meanings.sent3: The evincive footprints in the sand led to the treasure chest.
meanings.sent4: The evincive testimony of the witness sealed the case.
meanings.sent5: The evincive data supported the scientist's hypothesis.
